title: Sand Pirates of the Sahara
description: Roland the Intrepid Explorer is in search of the secret of the Pharaoh’s jewel, but first he must save the beautiful Emily from Prince Khalid’s capture.
altHero: Sandra Sinclair as Emily in Egyptian headdress looking at Brett Armstrong’s Roland
alt1: a mustached man holding up a lantern
alt3: Prince Khalid holds up a small, ancient-looking statue of a man
alt4: Emily gasps, perfectly aligned with a sphynx statute behind her
